import React, { Component } from 'react' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' class StepOne extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Segmentation', 'Scheduling', 'Overview'], broadcast: true, trigger: false, } render() { const { steps, broadcast, trigger } = this.state return (
Campaign Name this.handleInputFields('name', e.target.value)} />
Campaign Type this.setState((broadcast = !broadcast))}> Broadcast Campaign this.setState((trigger = !trigger))}> Trigger Campaign
) } } export default StepOne
